publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 62
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa Jedutun üśt́uńa miźmor David́niń. T́ek Teńriǵa išanadyr ǯanym andan jarlyɣašym ḿenim.
T́ek ol jaratuvčum da jarlyɣašym kipligim tajmammyn ullu tajmaḥ.
Qačan- ɣa dejiń saɣyš et́kejsiź qavšarlyḥny kiši üśt́uńa qaraḥlangejsiź bolgejsyz barčajyz enkajǵań farst kibik aḥtarylɣan Qora kibik tab́eriĺǵań.
T́ek ḱuč́uńd́ań anyn keńaš́ et́adirĺar tab́erḿa śuv́a- dirĺar aldavnu avzu byla alɣyš et́muš et́adirĺar da ičĺarińd́a qargejdyrlar hamḿeš́a.
T́ek Teńriǵa išanɣyn ǯanym ki andandyr umsunčum.
T́ek ol jaratuvčum da jarlyɣašym kipligim tajmammyn.
Teńrimd́ań jarlyɣašym da syjym kip jaratuvčum išančym ḿenim Teńridir.
Išanyjyz anar har vaḥt ulus t́oǵujuź alnynda gilajijiźni Teńri umsunč biźǵa hamḿeš́a.
T́ek h́eč́tir adam ulanlary jalɣandyr ulanlary kišiniń tarazuvlar byla keĺadir- ĺar ḱot́urḿa barlary jeńgiĺŕak bolurlar h́eč́likt́ań birǵa.

Išan- majyz zulumluḥqa da talavɣa alɣasanmajyz mal ki artsa qojmajyz
eśḱa.
Bir for śoźĺadi Teńri ekimo for bunu ešit́tim ki kiplik Teńridir.
Da śenińdir e H ševaɣat ki śeń t́olejsiń kišiǵa ešińa ḱoŕa.
